messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We need some secuirty on the ship, please come to the HOP office and apply there. We currently have a shortage of staff, we also need a HOS

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We still require more secuirty, please come to the HOP office to come help keep our crew in a better place

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Stuttering Station, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: W-We s-st-t-t-til-ll-l n-need-d s-sec-c-c-c c-c-crew-w-w, pl-leas-se come t-to t-t-t-th-he H-HOP-P of-ffic-ce if-f in-nt-teres-s-st-ted-d
